title: About Hypnotherapy
body: In this introduction to the Hypnotherapy for a New You audio meditations, Instructor Sophie Fox shares some insights to help understand how guided meditation and hypnotherapy works and all the benefits it can bring.
teaser: How do Hypnotherapy audios work? An introduction to the New You Hypnotherapy audio meditations.

title: Motivation
body:
Is lack of motivation deterring you from achieving your goals? 

This session will help you find the desire and the motivation to do – not only the things that you have to do every day, but also the things that you really want to do.

We recommend that you listen to our session at least four times so you can really compound the positive messaging, override the old beliefs and help your mind create new neural pathways so you’re much more motivated to achieve your goals. 

Please make sure you have listened to our introduction video at the start of this series to help understand how guided meditation and hypnotherapy works and all the benefits it can bring.
teaser: This session will help you find the desire and the motivation to do, not only the things that you have to do every day,  but also the things that you really want to do.

title: Healthy Weight
body:
Is your relationship to food, diet and weight loss unhealthy? The average person will try 126 fad diets over the course of their lifetime.  Many spend a lot of their lives trying to lose weight by trying different diets and often end up in a cycle dieting, losing weight, losing will power and starting all over again with a new diet.  

This session will help you change the habits your mind has created, and the relationship you have with food, to give you the determination and motivation to find and maintain the weight that is right for you.

We recommend that you listen to our session at least four times so you can really compound the positive messaging, override the old beliefs and help your mind create new neural pathways to healthy weight.

Please make sure you have listened to our introduction video at the start of this series to help understand how guided meditation and hypnotherapy works and all the benefits it can bring.
teaser: This session will help you change the habits your mind has created, and the relationship you have with food, to give you the determination and motivation to start a new healthy lifestyle.

title: Alcohol Moderation
body:
What is your state of mind when you are drinking?
Mindfulness is the key to drinking moderately. Being fully conscious of your drinking, how each drink is affecting your mood, behavior, thoughts, and your body.  

This session will help you rewire your thinking patterns around drinking alcohol and become mindful of when, where and how much you are drinking to manage your alcohol consumption within reasonable limits. 

We recommend that you listen to our session at least four times so you can really compound the positive messaging, override the old beliefs and help your mind create new neural pathways so you’re much more motivated and much more focused on managing your alcohol consumption mindfully. 

Please make sure you have listened to our introduction video at the start of this series to help understand how guided meditation and hypnotherapy works and all the benefits it can bring.
teaser: Mindfulness is the key to drinking moderately. Being fully conscious of your drinking, how each drink is affecting your mood, behavior, thoughts, and your body.

title: Resilience
body:
How do we build resilience so we can bounce back from challenging times? 
Resilience consists of a combination of behaviors, thoughts, actions and attitudes.  In this session we will be working on building resilience through commitment, control, and calmness.

 We recommend that you listen to our session at least four times so you can really compound the positive messaging, override the old beliefs and help your mind create new neural pathways so you feel more resilient and have the ability to bounce back from any situation.  

Please make sure you have listened to our introduction video at the start of this series to help understand how guided meditation and hypnotherapy works and all the benefits it can bring.
teaser: In this session we will be working on building resilience through commitment, control, and calmness.

title: Increase in Exercise
body:
Developing and Maintaining regular physical activity is essential for good health and happiness.  However, we often find it hard to maintain an exercise plan if we do it without discovering our ‘why’, our motivation. Whether your goal is to feel better, lose weight, get stronger, or to live a healthier life, staying on the right path takes consciousness and effort. 

Our session will help you to be committed to your exercise goals through changing thinking patterns and behavior. We recommend that you listen to our session at least four times so you can really compound the positive messaging, override the old beliefs and help your mind create new neural pathways so you’re much more motivated to exercise more. 

Please make sure you have listened to our introduction video at the start of this series to help understand how guided meditation and hypnotherapy works and all the benefits it can bring.
teaser: Our session will help you to be committed to your exercise goals through changing thinking patterns and behavior.

title: Healthy Eating
body:
When and why do we so often fail to change and commit to healthy eating habits? Why do we find junk food so addictive? How is healthy eating so important for our minds and bodies? 

We worked with nutritionists to better understand these patterns and designed this session to help you rewire your thinking patterns around food choices. You’ll learn how to replace those stubborn habits of eating junk food, snacking too much, eating excessive amounts of sugar bad fats and reinforce eating healthily. 

We recommend that you listen to our session at least four times so you can really compound the positive messaging, override the old beliefs and help your mind create new neural pathways so you’re much more motivated, much more interested in eating healthy foods in order to make those changes once and for all. 

Please make sure you have listened to our introduction video at the start of this series to help understand how guided meditation and hypnotherapy works and all the benefits it can bring.
teaser: We worked with nutritionists to better understand these patterns and designed this session to help you rewire your thinking patterns around food choices.

title: Stop Smoking
body:
This Stop Smoking guided meditation & hypnotherapy session is aimed for people who are 95% ready to stop smoking. If you are 50% ready, or just thinking about quitting or have any doubts about stopping then this session is not for you. We can only assist those that are committed and want to stop.

We recommend that you listen to our session at least four times so you can really compound the positive messaging, override the old beliefs and help your mind create new neural pathways so you’re much more motivated to achieve your goals.

Please make sure you have listened to our introduction video at the start of this series to help understand how guided meditation and hypnotherapy works and all the benefits it can bring.
teaser: This Stop Smoking guided meditation & hypnotherapy session is aimed for people who are 95% ready to stop smoking.
